root.name: Tachyon: The Fringe
root.description: General InfoIn Tachyon: The Fringe, a player controls a space ship and pilots it and completes missions. The game's main mass transport system are the tachyon gates, which are faster than light gates for traveling from system to system, and to different galaxies. There are a small number of ships in the game, depending on which faction the player works for. Once a player decided on one faction, there is no option to change. Ships can be upgraded on a limited basis, weapons and hardware. Hardware includes items such as shield managing enhancements, better thrusters, and missile guidance systems. A player can own as many ships as he or she desires. You can also hire 2 wingmen that you can issue commands to, to aid you in your missions. StoryYou play as a space ship pilot Jake Logan. The story opens with you completing missions in the Sol Sector and learning the basic controls. Early on, you are framed for the destruction of an entire space station and exiled to Fringe Space. The Fringe is where lawlessness is ample, and where two major corporations fight for control. Those corporations are The Galspan Corporation and the Bora. You must join one of these companies and work to find proof of your innocence. RequirementsWindows 2000, XP or Vista Pentium II 450MHz or better 128MB RAM Direct3D w/ 16MB or better DirectX version 6.0 500MB HDD Free
